basic_info.description: Love being creative, having things aesthetically sound, and working with a group to achieve a common goal. It's a DevLife for me!

projects.title: Cookie-Stand
projects.description: This project was the first truley challenging project I faced in my time with CodeFellows. We worked with tables and multiple pages and arrays... you name it, we had it!  Very exciting for me to try out css and experiment with ideas. I love how I was able to use different ideas to make things pop!

projects.title: Horned-Animals
projects.description: My first project using React! Took a little getting used to when it cam to css but react is exciting to use. Using things like components to work with each other and having the ability to bring in bootstraps with already built in layouts, definitely changed the game!

projects.title: Bus-Mall
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
